127 // inline methods
128 
129 inline CVector2d::CVector2d(const QPointF& point)
130 {
131  operator[](0) = point.x();
132  operator[](1) = point.y();
133 }
134 
135 
136 inline CVector2d::CVector2d()
137 {
138 }

140 
141 inline CVector2d::CVector2d(double x, double y)
142 {
143  operator[](0) = x;
144  operator[](1) = y;
145 }

153 
154 inline CVector2d::CVector2d(const istd::CIndex2d& index)
155 {
156  operator[](0) = index.GetX();
157  operator[](1) = index.GetY();
158 }

160 
161 inline double CVector2d::GetX() const
162 {
163  return operator[](0);
164 }
165 
166 
167 inline void CVector2d::SetX(double x)
168 {
169  operator[](0) = x;
170 }
171 
172 
173 inline double CVector2d::GetY() const
174 {
175  return operator[](1);
176 }
177 
178 
179 inline void CVector2d::SetY(double y)
180 {
181  operator[](1) = y;
182 }
183 
184 
185 inline CVector2d CVector2d::GetTranslated(const imath::TVector<2>& vector)
186 {
187  return *this + vector;
188 }
189 
190 
191 inline CVector2d CVector2d::GetHorizontalTranslated(double offsetX) const
192 {
193  return CVector2d(GetX() + offsetX, GetY());
194 }
195 
196 
197 inline CVector2d CVector2d::GetVerticalTranslated(double offsetY) const
198 {
199  return CVector2d(GetX(), GetY() + offsetY);
200 }
201 
202 
203 inline double CVector2d::GetCrossProductZ(const imath::TVector<2>& vector) const
204 {
205  return GetX() * vector[1] - GetY() * vector[0];
206 }
207 
208 
209 inline double CVector2d::GetAngle() const
210 {
211  return qAtan2(GetY(), GetX());
212 }
213 
214 
215 inline CVector2d CVector2d::operator-() const
216 {
217  return CVector2d(-GetX(), -GetY());
218 }
219 
220 
221 
222 inline CVector2d CVector2d::operator+(const imath::TVector<2>& vector) const
223 {
224  return CVector2d(GetX() + vector[0], GetY() + vector[1]);
225 }
226 
227 
228 
229 inline CVector2d CVector2d::operator-(const imath::TVector<2>& vector) const
230 {
231  return CVector2d(GetX() - vector[0], GetY() - vector[1]);
232 }
233 
234 
235 
236 inline CVector2d CVector2d::operator*(double scalar) const
237 {
238  return CVector2d(GetX() * scalar, GetY() * scalar);
239 }
240 
241 
242 
243 inline CVector2d CVector2d::operator/(double scalar) const
244 {
245  if (qAbs(scalar) < I_BIG_EPSILON){
246  scalar = (scalar > 0)? I_BIG_EPSILON: -I_BIG_EPSILON;
247  }
248 
249  return CVector2d(GetX() / scalar, GetY() / scalar);
250 }

287 inline CVector2d::operator QPointF() const
288 {
289  return QPointF(qreal(GetX()), qreal(GetY()));
290 }
